page.description: The Override Default Printer action allows you to set any available printer to be the default printer.

section.note: This action will override all subsequent print settings, even if a specific printer is requested.

step.description: Select the new default printer from the Printer name list. Specify the printer name exactly as it appears in the list when you select the Start > Settings > Printers command in Windows.
Select a printer port from the Specify the printer port list if the port is different from the port specified by the printer entry.
Optionally modify the comment that describes the action.
